If you LOVE blowing things up this is the game for you. In Just Cause 3 you play as Rico Rodriguez (a man with a reputation of breaking the chains of opperesion) with the goal of overthrowing dictator Sebastiano Di Ravello. To do this you must cause chaos by liberating towns by destroying propagander and destroying military infustructure. If you like the idea of that then this game is for you. There are some grapical glitches from time to time. But these are being patched.Overall I give this a 9.5/10 for great fun gameplay and new and improved mechanics.
